title: Telecommunication Device
description: A device or communication endpoint used to transmit observational data from a platform, typically identified by a phone number or IMEI.

telecomNumber.description: The phone number or contact identifier used for communication.

telecomIMEI.description: The International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) number assigned to the telecom device.

usesTechnology.description: The URI of the telecommunication technology used (e.g., IRIDIUM, GSM, VHF).
